live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41114.summary: Some customers in the Montery Park area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41114.title: Aug 26 – Calgary (Montery Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
